sentences.en: Cattle should be killed cleanly and humanely.
sentences.cn: 牛应该被干净利落地无痛屠宰。

sentences.en: Cowboys drove covered wagons and rode horses, lassoing cattle.
sentences.cn: 牛仔们有的赶着大篷车，有的骑着马，抛套索捕牛。

sentences.en: He had sought work as a cowboy, rounding up cattle.
sentences.cn: 他找了一份放牛的差事，负责把牛赶到一起。

sentences.en: He has twenty head of cattle on the farm.
I couldn't stand to watch them slaughter the cattle.
Kenya's beef comes from the zebu cattle.
sentences.cn: 肯尼亚的牛肉是瘤牛肉。

sentences.en: Local folklore has it that prehistoric men drove cattle over these cliffs.
sentences.cn: 当地民间传说中称,史前人类把野牛从这些悬崖上驱赶下去.

sentences.en: Outside, two old boys lingered on the street corner discussing cattle.
sentences.cn: 两个老头儿在外面街角迟迟不走，聊着牛的事情。

sentences.en: She drove the herd of cattle through the wilderness.
The cattle are being fattened for slaughter.
The cattle banded together for protection from the wind.
sentences.cn: 牲畜聚在一起抵御狂风.

sentences.en: The leaves of yew trees are poisonous to cattle.
The old stone cattle trough still sits by the main entrance.
sentences.cn: 陈旧的石制牛食槽仍然放在大门口。

phrases.tran_cn: 菜牛；肉牛；黑奴；供食肉类的牲口

trans.tran_en: cows and  bull s  kept on a farm for their meat or milk
